content: sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 5th and 7th points on the 7th point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 7th point ending at the corner joining the 5th and 7th points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the seven remaining unworked stitches on the 5th point do not fasten_off slip stitches the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 4th point mark as 8th point and fasten_off 9th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 8th and 4th points on the 8th point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 8th point ending at the corner joining the 8th and 4th points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the seven remaining unworked stitches on the 4th point do not fasten_off slip stitches the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 3rd point mark as 9th point and fasten_off 10th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 9th and 3rd points on the 9th point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 9th point ending at the corner joining the 9th and 3rd points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the seven remaining unworked stitches on the 3rd point do not fasten_off slip stitches the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 2nd point mark as 10th point and fasten_off 11th point- with right sides facing slip_stitch the first stitch of round 13 on the current point to the seventh stitch from the corner joining the 10th and 2nd points on the 10th point slip_stitch the next six stitches on the current point to the next six stitches on the 10th point ending at the corner joining the 10th and 2nd points do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the seven remaining unworked stitches on the 2nd point do not fasten_off slip_stitch the next seven stitches on the current point to the seven remaining unworked stitches on the 6th point do not fasten_off slip stitches the next seven stitches on the current point to the next seven stitches on the 7th point fasten_off 12th point- remove all point markers and stuff bottom half of the dodecahedron firmly adding cat toys to the middle to make noise optional with right sides facing begin slip stitching the stitches on row 13 of the 12th
